duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide evaluations and treatment interventions within the scope of practice established by law and professional code of ethics.
Assess and evaluate therapeutic/rehabilitative/functional status and participate in the development of the total plan of care.
Provide purposeful and skilled therapeutic care at patient’s home, using procedures and techniques to produce a change in condition/function consistent with the physician’s plan of care.
Instruct patient/family/caregiver in the use of therapies, exercises, therapeutic appliances, and/or prosthetic devices to be used outside of therapy sessions.
Prioritize caseload, determine daily staffing needs and coordinate assignments/handoffs.

education_certification.credential: Licensed Physical Therapy, Bachelors Degree, and Basic Cardiac Life Support or CPR for Healthcare Providers
